author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Hexagon tile floor tips…I use horseshoe shims to mimic the thin-set mortar height. Then I undercut the door casing with an oscillating multi-tool and scrap tile. I like sliding the hexagon tiles under door casings for a tight fit. If you need more tile floor tips visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#tilefloor #hexagontiles #bathroomrenovation #homerepairtutor
title: Hexagon Tile Floor Tips - #shorts #tilefloor #homerepairtutor
